titleStmt.title: The miserie of Flaunders, calamitie of Fraunce, misfortune of Portugall, vnquietnes of Irelande, troubles of Scotlande: and the blessed state of Englande. VVritten by Tho. Churchyarde Gent. 1579
titleStmt.author: Churchyard, Thomas, 1520?-1604.

publicationStmt.publisher: [By Felix Kingston] for Andrewe Maunsell, dwellyng in Paules Church-yard at the signe of the Parret,

notesStmt.note: C4 is cancelled without a gap in the text.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
